snippet: The well-documented mass killings by Sunni militants in Iraq have caused ordinary Iranians to rethink their views of the Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps.
abstract: Tehran Journal; well-documented mass killings by Sunni militants in Iraq have caused ordinary Iranians to rethink their views of Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps; group, who attacked many protesters on the streets in 2009, are now regularly lauded as reality of war is brought home.
lead_paragraph: The well-documented mass killings by Sunni militants in Iraq have caused ordinary Iranians to rethink their views of the Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps.

headline.main: With War at Doorstep, Iran Sees Its Revolutionary Guards in a Kinder Light
headline.print_headline: With War at Doorstep, Iran Sees Its Revolutionary Guards in a Kinder Light
